entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
